file.name: invalid_schema_types.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.1.1

# this example shows invalid types for the schemaObject

info:
  title: API
  version: 1.0.0
components:
  schemas:
    invalid_null: null
    invalid_number: 0
    invalid_array: []

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!seq into ogen.Schema; yaml: line 1: cannot unmarshal !!int `0` into ogen.Schema
